_a-0000edd3-c8fc-8000-9e0d-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_ClauseUsageReport_ColumnConfig
_a-0000edd3-c8fc-8000-9e0d-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!bundle: rule!AS_GCM_CO_UT_loadBundleFromFolder(langISOCode: null()),
  {
    a!map(
      cdtField: "clauseType",
      label: rule!AS_GAM_CO_I18N_UT_displayLabel(
        bundleKey: "lbl_ClauseType",
        bundle: local!bundle
      ),
      recordField: recordType!AS GCM R Clause.refType.refKey,
      width: "NARROW_PLUS",
      helpToolTip: null
    ),
    a!map(
      cdtField: "clauseSource",
      label: rule!AS_GAM_CO_I18N_UT_displayLabel(
        bundleKey: "lbl_ClauseSource",
        bundle: local!bundle
      ),
      recordField: recordType!AS GCM R Clause.refSource.refKey,
      width: "NARROW_PLUS",
      helpToolTip: null
    ),
    a!map(
      cdtField: "clauseSetCount",
      label: rule!AS_GAM_CO_I18N_UT_displayLabel(
        bundleKey: "lbl_ClauseSets",
        bundle: local!bundle
      ),
      recordField: recordType!AS GCM R Clause.clauseSetCount,
      width: "NARROW_PLUS",
      helpToolTip: rule!AS_GAM_CO_I18N_UT_displayLabel(
        bundleKey: "hlp_ClauseSetsCount",
        bundle: local!bundle
      )
    ),
    a!map(
      cdtField: "manuallyAddedCountInClauseSet",
      label: rule!AS_GAM_CO_I18N_UT_displayLabel(
        bundleKey: "txt_TimesAddedManually",
        bundle: local!bundle
      ),
      recordField: recordType!AS GCM R Clause.manuallyAddedCountInClauseSet,
      width: "NARROW_PLUS",
      helpToolTip: rule!AS_GAM_CO_I18N_UT_displayLabel(
        bundleKey: "hlp_TimesAddedManually",
        bundle: local!bundle
      )
    ),
    a!map(
      cdtField: "manuallyRemovedCountFromClauseSet",
      label: rule!AS_GAM_CO_I18N_UT_displayLabel(
        bundleKey: "txt_TimesRemovedManually",
        bundle: local!bundle
      ),
      recordField: recordType!AS GCM R Clause.manuallyRemovedCountFromClauseSet,
      width: "NARROW_PLUS",
      helpToolTip: rule!AS_GAM_CO_I18N_UT_displayLabel(
        bundleKey: "hlp_TimesRemovedManually",
        bundle: local!bundle
      )
    ),
    a!map(
      cdtField: "ruleCount",
      label: rule!AS_GAM_CO_I18N_UT_displayLabel(
        bundleKey: "lbl_Rules",
        bundle: local!bundle
      ),
      recordField: recordType!AS GCM R Clause.ruleCount,
      width: "NARROW_PLUS",
      helpToolTip: rule!AS_GAM_CO_I18N_UT_displayLabel(
        bundleKey: "hlp_RuleCount",
        bundle: local!bundle
      )
    ),
    a!map(
      cdtField: "templateCount",
      label: rule!AS_GAM_CO_I18N_UT_displayLabel(
        bundleKey: "lbl_Templates",
        bundle: local!bundle
      ),
      recordField: recordType!AS GCM R Clause.templateCount,
      width: "NARROW_PLUS",
      helpToolTip: rule!AS_GAM_CO_I18N_UT_displayLabel(
        bundleKey: "hlp_TemplateCount",
        bundle: local!bundle
      )
    )
  }
)

_a-0000edca-8e92-8000-9e0b-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_CPS_ClauseUsageReport_Configuration_Details
_a-0000edca-8e92-8000-9e0b-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!reportNameSplCharValidation: rule!AS_GCM_VD_validationForSpecialCharacters(
    text: ri!clauseUsageReport[recordType!AS GCM Clause Usage Report.reportName],
    i18nData: ri!bundle,
    labelName: "Report Name"
  ),
  rule!AS_GCM_CRD_ClauseUsageReport_CollapsibleSection(
    sectionLabel: "Details",
    contents: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sectionLayout_v1"(
      contents: {
        rule!AS_GCM_DPL_CO_INP_textField(
          label: "Report Name",
          labelPosition: "ABOVE",
          helpTooltip: "This will be used as the filename for the data table report",
          value: ri!clauseUsageReport[recordType!AS GCM Clause Usage Report.reportName],
          saveInto: ri!clauseUsageReport[recordType!AS GCM Clause Usage Report.reportName],
          characterLimit: cons!AS_GCM_INT_CHAR_LIMIT_CLAUSE_USAGE_REPORT_NAME,
          refreshAfter: "UNFOCUS",
          required: true,
          validations: local!reportNameSplCharValidation
        )
      },
      marginBelow: "STANDARD"
    ),
    bundle: ri!bundle,
    isValidationError: or(
      len(
        ri!clauseUsageReport[recordType!AS GCM Clause Usage Report.reportName]
      ) > cons!AS_GCM_INT_CHAR_LIMIT_CLAUSE_USAGE_REPORT_NAME,
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(local!reportNameSplCharValidation)
    )
  )
)

0007edcc-858e-8000-d10a-7f0000014e7a.name: AS GCM Generate Clause Usage Report

AS_GCM_HCL_ClauseUsageReport_Download

_a-0000e2ad-62e7-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_DSP_standardReadOnlyField
_a-0000e2ad-62e7-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"(
  label: ri!label,
  labelPosition: rule!AS_CO_UT_getLabelPosition(
    label: ri!label,
    labelPosition: ri!labelPosition,
    readOnly: true
  ),
  instructions: ri!instructions,
  helpTooltip: ri!helpTooltip,
  value: rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull(
    nullableValue: ri!value,
    replacementValue: if(
      rule!AS_CO_UT_booleanDefaultTrue(
        ri!showHyphenIfValueNull
      ),
      "-",
      ""
    )
  ),
  showWhen: ri!showWhen,
  readOnly: true,
  align: ri!align,
  accessibilityText: ri!accessibilityText
)

_a-0000ec50-376f-8000-9d94-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_getColorBasedOnColorName
_a-0000ec50-376f-8000-9d94-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!match(
  value: ri!colorName,
  /* White Colors */
  equals: "WHITE",
  then: cons!AS_GCM_HEX_CODE_WHITE,
  equals: "WHITE_2",
  then: cons!AS_GCM_HEX_CODE_WHITE_2,
  /* Gray Colors */
  equals: "GRAY_0",
  then: cons!AS_GCM_HEX_CODE_GRAY_0,
  equals: "GRAY_1",
  then: "#EDEDF2",
  equals: "GRAY_2",
  then: "#DCDCE5",
  equals: "GRAY_3",
  then: cons!AS_GCM_HEX_CODE_GRAY_3,
  equals: "GRAY_4",
  then: "#2E2E35",
  /* Orange Colors */
  equals: "ORANGE_1",
  then: "#FFEED3",
  equals: "ORANGE_2",
  then: "#FFDCA3",
  equals: "ORANGE_3",
  then: "#FAA92F",
  equals: "ORANGE_4",
  then: "#995C00",
  /* Blue Colors */
  equals: "BLUE_0",
  then: cons!AS_GCM_HEX_CODE_BLUE_0,
  equals: "BLUE_1",
  then: cons!AS_GCM_HEX_CODE_BLUE_1,
  equals: "BLUE_2",
  then: "#AFBFF8",
  equals: "BLUE_3",
  then: "#2322F0",
  equals: "BLUE_4",
  then: cons!AS_GCM_HEX_CODE_BLUE_4,
  equals: "BLUE_5",
  then: "#E9EDFC",
  equals: "BLUE_6",
  then: "#08088D",
  equals: "BLUE_7",
  then: "#DCDEF5",
  /* Green Colors  */
  equals: "GREEN_1",
  then: "#E3FBDF",
  equals: "GREEN_4",
  then: "#117C00",
  /* Teal Colors */
  equals: "TEAL_1",
  then: "#E2FAF9",
  equals: "TEAL_3",
  then: "#56ADC0",
  equals: "TEAL_4",
  then: "#2C6770",
  /* Purple Colors */
  equals: "PURPLE_1",
  then: "#F2E9FF",
  equals: "PURPLE_3",
  then: "#B561FF",
  equals: "PURPLE_4",
  then: "#790DA1",
  /* Red Colors */
  equals: "RED_4",
  then: "#9F0019",
  /* Yellow Colors */
  equals: "YELLOW_0",
  then: "#FFFCEB",
  equals: "YELLOW_1",
  then: "#FFF6C9",
  equals: "YELLOW_4",
  then: "#856C00",
  /* Appian Colors */
  equals: "APPIAN_BACKGROUND",
  then: cons!AS_GCM_HEX_CODE_APPIAN_BACKGROUND,
  equals: "ACCENT",
  then: "#2322f0",
  default: ri!colorName
)

_a-0000edca-8e92-8000-9e0b-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_CRD_ClauseUsageReport_Configuration
_a-0000edca-8e92-8000-9e0b-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
{
  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_cardLayout"(
    contents: {
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_headingField"(
        text: "Configuration",
        size: "SMALL",
        fontWeight: "SEMI_BOLD",
        headingTag: "H2"
      ),
      rule!AS_GCM_CPS_ClauseUsageReport_Configuration_Details(
        clauseUsageReport: ri!clauseUsageReport,
        bundle: ri!bundle
      ),
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_horizontalLine"(
        color: rule!AS_GCM_getColorBasedOnColorName(colorName: "GRAY_2"),
        marginAbove: "EVEN_LESS"
      ),
      rule!AS_GCM_CPS_ClauseUsageReport_Configuration_Clauses(
        clauseUsageReport: ri!clauseUsageReport,
        clauseUsageReportClauses: ri!clauseUsageReportClauses,
        bundle: ri!bundle
      ),
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_horizontalLine"(
        color: rule!AS_GCM_getColorBasedOnColorName(colorName: "GRAY_2"),
        marginAbove: "EVEN_LESS"
      ),
      rule!AS_GCM_CPS_ClauseUsageReport_Configuration_Display(
        allReportColumnConfigs: ri!allReportColumnConfigs,
        selectedReportColumnConfigs: ri!selectedReportColumnConfigs,
        bundle: ri!bundle
      )
    },
    style: rule!AS_GCM_getColorBasedOnColorName(colorName: "APPIAN_BACKGROUND"),
    padding: "STANDARD",
    showBorder: false
  )
}

_a-0000e994-0db4-8000-9c52-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_CP_recordActionItem

_a-0000e6c8-d132-8000-9bbe-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_UT_queryRecord

_a-0000edd3-c8fc-8000-9e0d-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_CPS_ClauseUsageReport_Configuration_Display
_a-0000edd3-c8fc-8000-9e0d-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
rule!AS_GCM_CRD_ClauseUsageReport_CollapsibleSection(
  sectionLabel: rule!AS_GAM_CO_I18N_UT_displayLabel(
    bundleKey: "lbl_Display",
    bundle: ri!bundle
  ),
  contents: rule!AS_CO_CP_checkBoxField(
    label: rule!AS_GAM_CO_I18N_UT_displayLabel(
      bundleKey: "lbl_ClauseUsageGridDetails",
      bundle: ri!bundle
    ),
    required: true,
    choiceLabels: index(ri!allReportColumnConfigs, "label", {}),
    choiceValues: ri!allReportColumnConfigs,
    value: ri!selectedReportColumnConfigs,
    saveInto: ri!selectedReportColumnConfigs
  ),
  bundle: ri!bundle
)

_a-0000e615-fd0f-8000-9bc1-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_VD_validationForSpecialCharacters
AS_GCM_DSP_clauseRecordTitle

_a-0000e61a-f20f-8000-9ba5-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GAM_CO_I18N_UT_displayLabel

_a-0000edca-8e92-8000-9e0b-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_QR_GetClauseUsageReportClauses

_a-0000e2ad-62e7-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_CP_checkBoxField
_a-0000e2ad-62e7-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
with(
  local!displayValue: apply(
    displayvalue(_, ri!choiceValues, ri!choiceLabels, null),
    {ri!value}
  ),
  if(ri!readOnly,
    rule!AS_CO_DSP_standardReadOnlyField(
      label: ri!label,
      instructions: ri!instructions,
      value: if(isnull(ri!readOnlyValue),
        if(rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(local!displayValue),
            null,
            joinarray(local!displayValue, char(10))
          ),
        ri!readOnlyValue
      ),
      labelPosition: ri!labelPosition,
      helpTooltip: ri!helpTooltip,
      showWhen: if(isnull(ri!showWhen), true, ri!showWhen),
      accessibilityText: ri!accessibilityText
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_checkboxField"(
      label: ri!label,
      labelPosition: rule!AS_CO_UT_getLabelPosition(
        label: ri!label,
        labelPosition: ri!labelPosition,
        readOnly: ri!readOnly
      ),
      instructions: ri!instructions,
      helpTooltip: ri!helpTooltip,
      choiceLabels: ri!choiceLabels,
      choiceValues: ri!choiceValues,
      value: if(rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(local!displayValue),
        null,
        ri!value
      ),
      saveInto: ri!saveInto,
      showWhen: if(isnull(ri!showWhen), true, ri!showWhen),
      required: if(ri!readOnly, false, ri!required),
      /* Updated requiredMessage parameter to show default validation text*/
      requiredMessage: rule!AS_CO_UT_displayRequiredMessage(
        label: ri!label,
        requiredMessage: ri!requiredMessage
      ),
      disabled: ri!disabled,
      choiceLayout: ri!choiceLayout,
      validations: ri!validations,
      validationGroup: ri!validationGroup,
      align: ri!align,
      accessibilityText: ri!accessibilityText
    )
  )
)

_a-0000e2ad-62e7-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_UT_getLabelPosition
AS_CO_UT_left

_a-0000edca-8e92-8000-9e0b-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_CPS_ClauseUsageReport_Configuration_Clauses

_a-0000eb44-a528-8000-9d15-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_UT_displayRequiredMessage

_a-0000eb16-753f-8000-9d01-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_CP_recordActionField
_a-0000eb16-753f-8000-9d01-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_recordActionField_v1"(
  actions: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
    items: ri!actions,
    expression: rule!AS_GCM_CP_recordActionItem(
      action: fv!item,
      identifier: ri!identifier
    )
  ),
  style: ri!style,
  display: ri!display,
  openActionsIn: ri!openActionsIn,
  align: ri!align,
  accessibilityText: ri!accessibilityText,
  showWhen: ri!showWhen,
  securityOnDemand: a!defaultValue(
    value: ri!securityOnDemand,
    /* By default setting the value to false when the automation toggle is turned on as the Fitnesse doesn't support this feature yet. */
    default: and(
      cons!AS_GCM_BOL_RECORD_ACTION_SECURITY_ON_DEMAND_TOGGLE,
      not(
        cons!AS_GCM_TOGGLE_AUTOMATION_TESTING_ENABLED
      ),
      contains({ "MENU", "MENU_ICON" }, ri!style)
    )
  )
)

_a-0000edca-8e92-8000-9e0b-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_CRD_ClauseUsageReport_CollapsibleSection

_a-0000eb28-f476-8000-9d09-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_DPL_CO_INP_textField
_a-0000eb28-f476-8000-9d09-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
if(
  ri!readOnly,
  rule!AS_CO_DSP_standardReadOnlyField(
    label: ri!label,
    instructions: ri!instructions,
    value: ri!value,
    labelPosition: ri!labelPosition,
    helpTooltip: ri!helpTooltip,
    showWhen: ri!showWhen,
    accessibilityText: ri!accessibilityText,
    align: ri!align
  ),
  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"(
    label: ri!label,
    labelPosition: rule!AS_CO_UT_getLabelPosition(
      label: ri!label,
      labelPosition: ri!labelPosition,
      readOnly: false
    ),
    instructions: ri!instructions,
    helpTooltip: ri!helpTooltip,
    placeholder: ri!placeholder,
    value: ri!value,
    /* We are using nested saveIntos to automatically perform a trim on any value */
    /* before executing the actual saves */
    /* Saves can be nested in this format to allow for better reusability */
    saveInto: a!save(ri!saveInto, trim(save!value)),
    refreshAfter: ri!refreshAfter,
    showWhen: ri!showWhen,
    required: if(ri!readOnly, false, ri!required),
    requiredMessage: rule!AS_CO_UT_displayRequiredMessage(
      label: ri!label,
      requiredMessage: ri!requiredMessage
    ),
    readOnly: ri!readOnly,
    disabled: ri!disabled,
    masked: ri!masked,
    validations: if(ri!readOnly, {}, ri!validations),
    validationGroup: ri!validationGroup,
    align: ri!align,
    accessibilitytext: ri!accessibilityText,
    inputPurpose: ri!inputPurpose,
    characterLimit: ri!characterLimit,
    showCharacterCount: a!defaultValue(
      value: ri!showCharacterCount,
      default: false()
    )
  )
)
